nodes.text: The Tao-Ni Security Elite Protector was a type of battle droid that was used in IG-88's Droid Army. When IG-88 took control of Nym's Factory Compound in 1 ABY, some Tao-Ni Security Elite Protectors were stationed outside it. Some spacers attacked and defeated them, before entering the compound and starting the Battle of Nym's Factory Compound.
